A frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
A backend application connecting to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
User authentication and authorization system for secure access
Case information browsing interface with search and filter capabilities
Real-time report submission functionality with live updates
Work hours logging feature with time tracking capabilities
Estimated expense sheet generation and viewing functionality
Service assignment sheet creation and management interface
Data collection and storage system for all application entities
Real-time reporting dashboard with live data visualization
Responsive UI design with beige background and saddle brown styled components
Concurrent development server setup for frontend and backend
Automated installation script for both frontend and backend dependencies
Database schema design supporting cases, reports, work hours, expenses, and assignments
API endpoints for CRUD operations on all core application entities
